entities.name: creatures
entities.description: The text describes the entities as being at the narrator's feet, indicating that they are physical objects or beings present in the scene.

entities.name: ropes
entities.description: The ropes are described as 'broken', suggesting that they have been damaged or severed.

relationships.description: The text states that 'Broken ropes trailed from both ankles' of the creatures, indicating a physical connection between them.
This relationship is bidirectional, as the ropes are attached to the creatures and vice versa.
